resources.string: Displays the preferences that can be used to bypass ANZ GoMoney\'s Root Detection and have the ability to spoof your device to enable GoMoney Wallet (NFC Payment).
Displays the preferences that can be used to bypass Semble\'s Root Detection and also bypass "OS not Supported" messages for Marshmallow users.
Displays the preferences that can be used to bypass TVNZ onDemand\'s Root Detection checks when watching a onDemand video.

You can contact me using any of the methods below where you can send me feedback (about whether its the module is working for you or not), bug reports, feature requests or to simply follow me on social media for updates.\n\nRemember to actually write an actual message when contacting me! You\'d be surprised how many people emailed me with no message.
Module is not compatible with your device.
Module compatible with your version of the ANZ GoMoney App.
Module is not compatible with your version of the ANZ GoMoney App.
GoMoney Wallet will be disabled until this module is updated.
GoMoney Wallet will be disabled when root detection is disabled.
Displays helpful information about the module, troubleshooting etc.
Enable this to avoid root detection for the ANZ GoMoney app.
Spoofs your device information (to be shown as a Samsung Galaxy Note 3) which may allow GoMoney Wallet to work. This function is limited to your phone\'s hardware and software capabilities.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in the Semble applications.

Bypass the \"OS not supported\" message on Semble-supported devices that have newer Android OS version installed which Semble was not designed to be used on. Handy for Marshmallow or Lollipop users and users of Custom ROMs.

Spoofs your device information (to be shown as a Samsung Galaxy Note 3) which will bypass "Device Not Supported" messages and may allow Semble services to work. This function is limited to your phone\'s hardware and software capabilities is essential for users devices that are not on the Semble Compatibility list.
Enable to bypass the various root checks found in the TVNZ onDemand application.
You MUST clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and re-login in order fro your changes to be in effect. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.

In order to spoof your device you must clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and re-login otherwise the spoofing feature will not activate. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.

The author and contributors of SuperKiwi as well as ANZ, Semble, TVNZ and their partners take no responsibility for any loss of data, monetary loss, damage to your device or any other consequences that arise as a result of using this program.\n\nUSE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
